name: Our House - Notion Template
description: Home is where the heart is.A utilitarian Notion template that covers all the basics of homeownership. Keep track of your house-buying process, offers, and inspections. Then, after you've purchased your home, write down ideas, contractor bids, renovation dates, and before/after photos.
